description: Returns a list of tokens for a workspace service account. Service accounts are only available for workspaces that are compatible with Grafana version 9 and above.

parameters.name: serviceAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the service account for which to return tokens.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace for which to return tokens.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of service accounts.

nested_items.name: serviceAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the service account where the tokens reside.

nested_items.name: serviceAccountTokens
nested_items.description: An array of structures containing information about the tokens.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: When the service account token was created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: When the service account token will expire.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the service account token.

nested_items.name: lastUsedAt
nested_items.description: The last time the token was used to authorize a Grafana HTTP API.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the service account token.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the workspace where the tokens reside.
